extension.summary: Retrospect (a.k.a. XBMC Online TV) is an add-on that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Set of Dutch RTL channels, RTL 4, 5, 7 & 8 channels for Retrospect
extension.disclaimer: Retrospect is provided as is. We do not take any responsibility for possible (but highly unlikely) damage cause to your system. Nor do we take responsibility for the content that can be watched via this add-on. Retrospect gaat altijd akkoord met het plaatsen van cookies door de rtl.nl website. Wilt u dit niet, dan moet u dit kanaal niet langer gebruiken binnen Retrospect.
